text: Tapa'ile uniharula'i jaba dekhnuhuncha ta unaka sarira tapa'ila'i ramro lagdachan ra yadi tiniharule kura gardachan ta unaka kura tapa'i suni rakhnuhuncha. Yasari jasto ki uniharu kathaharu (thama) hun jasala'i bhittako saharama ubhya'i'eko cha. Pratyeka thulo svarala'i uniharule aphnai virud'dhama thandachan. Tinai vastavika satru hun. Atah uniharubata panchi'era basa, allaha uniharula'i samapta garos. Uniharu vimukha bha'i kaham ga'irakheka chan
